description: Ingress is a collection of rules that allow inbound connections to reach the endpoints defined by a backend. An Ingress can be configured to give services externally-reachable URLs, load balance traffic, terminate SSL, offer name-based virtual hosting etc.

apiVersion.description: apiVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.

kind.description: A string value representing the REST resource this object represents.

metadata.description: Standard object's metadata. The name must be a valid DNS subdomain.

spec.description: The desired state of the Ingress.

status.description: The current state of the Ingress.
